title: template
author: template
content: bitcoinjumper.com Bitcoin Transaction Accelerator is scam do not use this fake service

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Most transaction accelerators do offer free service; how does this mention people scamming you?Did you use the pay service, and after paying, they were unable to process your request?Please make your scam allegations detailed.And if it's proper scam information, move this thread to  scam accusations.

comments.author: zasad@
comments.created_time: June 17, 2023, 09:07:53 AMLast edit: June 17, 2023, 09:41:02 AM by zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: template on June 17, 2023, 07:35:38 AMbitcoinjumper.com Bitcoin Transaction Accelerator is scam do not use this fake servicespider703Â helps speed up your bitcoin transactions for free:FREE/PAY BITCOIN TRANSACTION ACCELERATORhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5034315.3260Move your topic to  Scam accusations board___These services are also free, but I don't know if they work. If you can check it out, please share. Do not pay money for such services to unknown services.https://cryptocurrency360.com/bitcoin-accelerator/https://bitaccelerate.com/

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I don't know anything about bitcoinjumper.com that I haven't used explicitly, I generally don't use paid Bitcoin Transaction Accelerator.Usually, if I have to Accelerate the transaction, I use the free service from ViaBTC:https://www.viabtc.com/tools/txacceleratorThe service is free for transactions of less than 0.5 kb (or 500 bytes), but transactions larger than that become paid.
